data.text: As CEAir flight attendant, Lucine Magand travels a lot. This time she went to Chengdu with her husband. They ate local roast fish, saw giant pandas. Do you know why she didn’t have enough time? https://t.co/2toTH5Leim
This is a tale of two cities from CEAir flight attendant Lucine Magand. Do you travel a lot between the two cities? https://t.co/6cTMZEGHAo

Chengdu is one of only 3 cities that have 2 airports. With the operation of the new airport, people in this SW China city will enjoy more travel convenience and options. Let’s take a little time to hear what CEAir flight attendant Lucine Magand says about the new change. https://t.co/PQ7M1hpHW1

data.text: Congratulations to Chinese Woman's Soccer Team! They just won a game in Seoul. CEAir was proud of taking these 45 female heroes and their coaches home. Wish they will shine again in Tokyo Olympic Games field. #MUNews https://t.co/PtcCtOQSUd

data.text: The little boy's finger was cut off by a machine and needed to fly to Xi' an for surgery ASAP. Knowing this, CEAir gave complete support and opened the green channel twice by security check and air control, and arrived 34 minutes earlier! Wish the boy recover soon.#MUService https://t.co/ZLPNDECZR3
@vannastranger plz dm us

Plz don’t hesitate and send your photos of Chinese villages to us. 100 of your artworks will be selected and displayed altogether. The most LIKED 3 ones will be printed on CEAir boarding passes and we will visit the 3 most amazing places. #100beautifulcountryroad

Country roads, take me home
To the place I belong,
The mountain air's fresh day and night;
Together birds go home in flight.
Have you ever encountered with a place in China that is so beautiful that you have the idea to settle down. https://t.co/vNTDIli92w

Today is #UNChineseLanguageDay. Tony really wants to take a CEAir plane to Shanghai. Let’s learn some chinese with him.
我爱你上海（wǒ ài nǐ shàng hǎi）
吾欢喜上海（ngu huoe shi zaon he）
These are Mandarin and Shanghai dialect, both mean "I love ShangHai", have you got it? https://t.co/dpLjFNxub2

entity.description: The SpaceX CEO debates with the Alibaba founder at the World AI Conference in Shanghai.

data.text: Let's find out how CEAir French attendant Lucine Magand feels towards Shanghai. https://t.co/UysMMhyg3H
Want to know about Grain Rain (Guyu)? #24solarterms Click here: https://t.co/M6Jg1o89M9 https://t.co/wZBTFneCjF

Today is one of the 24 solar terms, Grain Rain. It is the last solar term of spring. Grain Rain signals the end of cold weather. All of the plants, trees and flowers need rain to grow and seed. But our kids need love instead of the raindrop. #24solarterms https://t.co/wdrhjgmA2I

data.text:
Sit tight, let's fly over Wuhan. 
@visit_wuhan @OpticsValleyCN https://t.co/WeWhSXuuBV

Morning, guys. These are our “passengers” for today! 
#MUService https://t.co/zAckOSGIJe

Flowers have always been one of Tang Jing's favorite things. Two sides, flourish better.
#ladypower https://t.co/Pdvh0y7cqU
Qinling Mountains, Shaanxi, China. Aug, 2020. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/IMCfWEIkbw
CAVOK, ready to fly! https://t.co/Be9b3dD3Qf
Qinling Mountains, Shaanxi, China. Aug, 2020. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/rxB2aJjL9i

In order to ensure a safe flight, ground service crew usually communicates with air crew by using a variety of hand gestures. Could you work out what the hand gesture means in the photo？#CEAirguess #MUService https://t.co/ztlJf4Vyc7
Qinling Mountains, Shaanxi, China. Aug, 2020. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/TRUp1YpesK

In the city of Wuhan, rivers and lakes, old and new, east and west meet in one place. Today Wuhan revives and expects more encounters. Together with @visit_wuhan , join us to find out what is different in Wuhan now. @OpticsValleyCN https://t.co/jCBrrq8NZs

Wuhan University is a MUST attraction in Wuhan. The tree-lined campus is surrounded by lakes, mountains. When cherry blossoms on Avenue are in full bloom during spring, it is like walking in pale pink dream. @visit_wuhan  @OpticsValleyCN https://t.co/WzFnOpTt11

data.text: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.. Monday, fight for your goals! #ladypower https://t.co/v7oRl3CUhY
Qinling Mountains, Shaanxi, China. Aug, 2020. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/TaaQ3qBI5j

As a pilot of CEAir, traveling is Xu Hanlin's greatest hobby. 
How about you this weekend? Where do you want to fly?
#ladypower https://t.co/4dmYfxPzCn
@Renboyu yes, you are right.

The Yellow Crane Tower is the most famous landmark in Wuhan. From the top of the building, you will enjoy a full view of Wuhan and the Yangtze River. It is more orientally artistic under the lights. It is worth your visit with your loved ones. 
@visit_wuhan @OpticsValleyCN https://t.co/dMAMGzW668

Today is #WorldHealthDay . We will show you how to perform disinfection in all areas on CEAir planes including regular service, food catering, cabin. Your safety and health thru the flight is our top concern. https://t.co/RvJ57MouFN

data.text: Qinling Mountains, Shaanxi, China. Aug, 2020. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/GdcrFv57Co

Breakfast is the most important meal for people in Wuhan, Reganmian (hot-dry noodles) is noodles with sesame sauce. Besides, there are over 100 types of breakfast, like fried tofu skin, steamed corn bread, spicy pancake. Plz come to Wuhan to wake up your stomachs. 
 @visit_wuhan https://t.co/sHGD1J9IvZ

Gongga West Slope, Ganzi, Sichuan, China. Nov, 2019.
#ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/zzEmCJC1IH

The key to success is self-confidence, and the key to self-confidence is to be ready at any time.
So, the new week starts, are you ready to fly with us? #ladypower https://t.co/QSrtX279JV

Want to learn more about Clear and Bright? #24solarterms 
Click here: https://t.co/kfmFjPYCKf https://t.co/cT5ABiOj7X

Today is Clear and Bright (Qingming). It is also a traditional Chinese festival, Tomb-Sweeping Day. The deepest tribute goes to the heroes who sacrificed their lives in the past 100 years for our peace, which allow us to have hope in sunshine and spring scenes. #24solarterms https://t.co/knoxGOzlre
Aligang Rinpoche, Tibet, China. May, 2019. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/1fvgq6No8U

Life is like a climb and there are times when you need to rest. 
It's Friday, time to relax! https://t.co/r0y4VjZhcn

Morning, guys. Need hot drinks to refresh yourselves before departure? CEAir has made rich coffee for you, why not stop by and take a try. #MUService https://t.co/7aeb1eHx3U

data.text: Tagong Grassland, Ganzi, Sichuan, China. Oct, 2020. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/B4ypNsqEHG
Aligang Rinpoche, Tibet, China. May, 2019. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/G3uBqwF3GP

It is a typical pastime for Hangzhou people to visit tea houses sipping tea from morning to afternoon. Hangzhou’s specialty Longjing tea has refreshing flavor to wipe away life stress. Come to Hangzhou, order a cup of tea and enjoy a idle life. #TravelwithCEAir @Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/zE8GqgVi8x
@skyteam Thanks, 🤝

Wandering around Hangzhou’s traditional alleys in drizzling rain, nothing is more gratifying than holding a delicate oil-paper umbrella. As a traditional Chinese culture, the handicraft gives you a glimpse of both ancient and modern Hangzhou. #TravelwithCEAir @Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/ZUUyc9RdAA
@CSCECNEWS Thanks for your attention!
@EnergyChinaNews Thanks for your attention, EC pal.
@Harbin_Electric Hi, HE pal. It is so generous of you. Plz stay tuned, we will present more stories.
@CRECofficial Thanks, CREC pal.
Welcome this Monday with a new mood! Work hard and move forward to your goals! #ladypower https://t.co/ukgzU2xevh
@NewsAsia24 Thanks for your attention.

Plz reach us by other platforms as well:
TikTok: ceairglobal
YouTube: China Eastern Airlines
Facebook: ceair
Instagram: china_eastern_airlines
Linkedln: China Eastern Airlines Global

data.text: As Chinese people say ”Heaven above, Hangzhou below”, Hangzhou is teeming with scenic, cultural and historical attractions. It’s time to visit West lake, a UNESCO world heritage site as basking in spring sunshine. Take a boat cruise and enjoy the southern city. @@Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/ndJ2GOrmFC

data.text: As March walks in, we are getting a taste of breezy warm spring. This time #TravelwithCEAir will bring you to a Chinesecity full of springtime bliss. Does the following hint give you any idea of which city it is? @Hangzhou_CHINA https://t.co/lsFy3Dsg3t

Attention, guys! CEAir has just launched brand new airline delicacy “花开富贵” (mean: happy life). The hand-made pastry package tastes tender. Got interested? Come and have a taste. #MUService https://t.co/YFOyF7XvOw
Diego is one of our Italian captains. He is a hard working & respectable guy in CEAir family and a caring & responsible father in his family. https://t.co/niBDZgvXqq

data.text: Gongga West Slope, Ganzi, Sichuan, China. Nov, 2019. #ViewsInCEAirEyes https://t.co/IMawHnAu1S

In Ningbo, there is a marriage custom called "Ten-mile Wedding procession". On the wedding day, dowries are fully prepared, the line to welcome the dowry could stretch for 10 miles. Now you have the chance to experience it by yourself. #TravelwithCEAir  @TravelNingbo https://t.co/3eua6ErIRr

data.text:
Want to learn more about Spring Equinox? #24solarterms 
Click here: https://t.co/2Q06tbrSWL https://t.co/8i0BSpSdrH

Today is one of the 24 solar terms, Spring Equinox. It signals the equal length of the day and night time. Through CEAir’s employment programme for poverty alleviation , more girls from underdeveloped mountainous area are given wings to fulfill their dreams and fly to the sky. https://t.co/QoDvabNgDR
RT @InsightNingbo: The air cargo volume at #Ningbo Lishe International Airport reached 2,932.2 tons in the first two months of 2021, a year…
It's Friday again! After a week’s work,  it’s time to relax! Let's spend the weekend with our flight attendant Deng Yuxue. #ladypower https://t.co/jrgC4CmQ6M

On March 17, CEA transported China-made vaccines from Beijing to Santo Domingo. It is China’s first intercontinental all-cargo charter flight for COVID-19 vaccines. The delivery was received by Dominican Vice President @RaquelPenaVice . Bridging the world, CEAir is on the way. https://t.co/iV1zyagBLY

data.text: Diego is one of our Italian captains. After joining CEAir in 2018, he took his family to Wuhan. In his eyes, Wuhan is a charming city, with a convenient lifestyle, and the traditional cuisine is mouth-watering. Click the video to explore Wuhan with Diego.  #MUfriends #PalOnRoad https://t.co/TsNWUXwVBi

Ningbo, is a charming water city. If you want to get a glimpse into Ningbo’s glamorous water views, Yuehu Park is absolutely a must-go place.Tianyige, the oldest private library in China, is also located in here! #TravelwithCEAir 
@TravelNingbo https://t.co/tX4c6sW0fh
RT @skyteam: Your safety means everything to us. That’s why all 19 SkyTeam member airlines are committed to SkyCare&Protect, our alliance-w…

Ningbo’s glutinous rice ball is white and tender, chewy and tasty.Once taking a gentle bite, the nutty black sesame filling melts in your mouth with the sweet fragrance overflowing. Come to get a real taste of this popular dessert. #TravelwithCEAir @TravelNingbo https://t.co/7BYQ8YWldH

Good morning! A new week begins!
Together with our flight attendant Deng Yuxue , fly towards a better life! #ladypower https://t.co/t7ja03iDWl

Do you know what day it is today?
Hint: π = 3.1415926...

Right! Today is #PiDay 
On this day, eating pie is an indispensable part of the celebration!
Here is a special offer of delicious pie made by CEAir chef. 
Happy Pi Day to everyone! https://t.co/0JoSGNXPkO

data.text: #TravelwithCEAir in this month will show you around a port city in SE China, full of delicious food, beautiful sceneries, and splendid history and culture. Any idea of which city it is? @TravelNingbo https://t.co/1ikeGM7Ps7
Have you ever seen the sea of clouds? If not, CEAir is very honored to take you to witness! https://t.co/RBuN7F88CD
@9999Cirno9999 不辛苦的，亲。谢谢您的关注。维护公司形象是我们的责任。

Hi, VOA. The picture attached in your tweet is WRONG! Please correct the misleading message ASAP!
